news.title: Lifeline Biotechnologies' (LLBO) Affiliate, Cyrcadia, Registers Clinical Trial
news.summary: RENO, NV -- (Marketwired) -- 08/11/15 -- Lifeline Biotechnologies (OTC PINK: LLBO) announces its affiliate, Cyrcadia, has listed its clinical trial on ClinicalTrials.gov for its wearable breast cancer early detection device at El Camino Hospital…
